name: List
title: Google
Cloud
Pubsub
Subscription
List
description: Subscription::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Google
Cloud
Pubsub
Subscription
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more subscriptions that match the request and this value should be passed to the next Google::Cloud::Pubsub::Topic#subscriptions to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Google
Cloud
Pubsub
Subscription
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more subscriptions that match the request and this value should be passed to the next Google::Cloud::Pubsub::Topic#subscriptions to continue.

methods.name: next?
title: Google
Cloud
Pubsub
Subscription
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there a next page of subscriptions.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/pubsub"

pubsub = Google::Cloud::Pubsub.new

subscriptions = pubsub.subscriptions
if subscriptions.next?
  next_subscriptions = subscriptions.next
end

require "google/cloud/pubsub"

pubsub = Google::Cloud::Pubsub.new

subscriptions = pubsub.subscriptions
if subscriptions.next?
  next_subscriptions = subscriptions.next
end

methods.name: all
title: Google
Cloud
Pubsub
Subscription
List#all
methods.description:
Retrieves remaining results by repeatedly invoking #next until #next? returns false. Calls the given block once for each result, which is passed as the argument to the block.

An Enumerator is returned if no block is given.

This method will make repeated API calls until all remaining results are retrieved. (Unlike #each, for example, which merely iterates over the results returned by a single API call.) Use with caution.

examples.caption: Iterating each subscription by passing a block:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/pubsub"

pubsub = Google::Cloud::Pubsub.new

subscriptions = pubsub.subscriptions
subscriptions.all do |subscription|
  puts subscription.name
end

examples.caption: Using the enumerator by not passing a block:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/pubsub"

pubsub = Google::Cloud::Pubsub.new

subscriptions = pubsub.subscriptions
all_names = subscriptions.all.map do |subscription|
  subscription.name
end

examples.caption: Limit the number of API calls made:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/pubsub"

pubsub = Google::Cloud::Pubsub.new

subscriptions = pubsub.subscriptions
subscriptions.all(request_limit: 10) do |subscription|
  puts subscription.name
end

params.name: request_limit
params.description:
The upper limit of API requests to
make to load all subscriptions. Default is no limit.

params.name: yield
params.description: The block for accessing each subscription.
